name: wvo-mcp-server
description: WeatherVane Orchestrator MCP server for autonomous repo management.

scripts.register:codex: codex mcp add weathervane -- node dist/index.js --workspace ../../..
scripts.register:claude: claude mcp add weathervane -- node dist/index-claude.js --workspace ../../..
scripts.auto:codex: npm run build && npm run register:codex && codex session --profile weathervane_orchestrator
scripts.auto:claude: npm run build && npm run register:claude && claude chat --mcp weathervane
